channel.title: Devolution Redone! 10% done
channel.description:
Today i have made a lot of progress. I have tooken out all the npcs, and have replaced them with new ones. There are also new drops that lead a charactor to better stats. Here is some of my npc progress.
Rats are now skeleton mages. -full steel -black 2h -defence amulet
Druids are now river trolls. -full black -mith 2h -strength amulet -2k
Ice warriors (Found in hut by river trolls. -full mith -rune scimatar
hill giants are now spirit trees. -full addy -addy 2h
Heros -rune -rune 2h
Instead of dad, POSEST PRIEST! -full blue mystic -key
Dragon Teleport! -king black dragon -santa hat 1% robin 5% Ranger boots 1% -20 noted d bones
baby dragons -5 noted d bones
LEGENDS GUILD! Skeletons (77) -Full skelly
Giant rock crab -Full rock-shell
Slash-Bash -full spined (good)
DUNGEON
As you enter, rock golem -obby maul -obby cape -warrior ring
Instead of san tojalon, KAMIL AND FAREED!
Kamil -full gilded, new stats -warrior helm -warrior ring -blurite sword, now one of best weapons. - orange key Fareed, -full dragon -cook gaunts -dessert boots -warrior helm -orange key
Over the monkey bars,
READDED BARROWS DONT KNOW WHY I TOOK OUT BUT I ACTUALY LEFT SPACE!
-Dragonath rex! -whip -full black mystic, best mage bonus -berserker helm -berserker ring
AND FOR THE BEST WEAPON DROP -Arizon avatiar of strength! (FOR THOSE ON A 317 CLIENT ITS ARMADYLE GS!) WILL ADD FOR SILAB ALSO!
ONLY 10% DONE WILL KEEP WORKING!
ALSO IF ANYONE WANTS TO HELP AND HOST FOR ME MY EMAIL IS
mikeownsu666@hotmail.com
